acceptsContactError.English: Must choose to opt in if email is present
acceptsContactError.French: Vous devez vous inscrire si vous fournissez une adresse e-mail.

americanIndian.Spanish: Aborigen del norteamérica o nativo de Alaska

byEnteringRanger.English: By entering, I agree to be bound to the Official Rules and the decisions of Sponsor.

canAlwaysTrust.English: Ford is a brand I can always trust.

clickPreference.English: Please click on the response that indicates your preference.
clickPreference.Spanish: Haga clic en la respuesta que corresponda.

clickPrivacyPolicy.English: Click here to read Ford Motor Company's privacy policy.
clickPrivacyPolicy.Spanish: Haga clic aquí para consultar la política de confidencialidad de Ford Motor Company.

clickPrivacyPolicyCA.English: Click here to read CA Privacy Policy
clickPrivacyPolicyCA.Spanish: Haga clic aquí para consultar la política de confidencialidad de California.

clickTermsAndConditions.English: Click here to read terms and conditions.
clickTermsAndConditions.Spanish: Haga clic aquí para consultar las condiciones.

currentOwner.English: Are you currently a Ford owner?

brandForMe.English: How much do you agree or disagree with the statement "Ford is a brand for me"?

neitherAgreeorDisagree.Spanish: Ni de acuerdo ni en desacuerdo

doNotAccept.English: I do not accept these terms.

driveMostOften.English: What is the vehicle you drive most often?

eitherEmailOrPhoneRequired.English: Either Email or Phone is required.
eitherEmailOrPhoneRequired.French: Veuillez saisir votre numéro de téléphone ou votre adresse e-mail.
eitherEmailOrPhoneRequired.Spanish: Se requiere correo electrónico o teléfono

emailAgreement.English: Please email me communications including product information, offers, and incentives from Ford Motor Company and the local dealer.
emailAgreement.Spanish: Quiero recibir comunicaciones, incluidas información sobre productos y servicios, encuestas, y ofertas especiales de Ford Motor Company y sus concesionarios.

emailAgreementProSeries.English: By selecting “YES” below, I agree to communications, including emails and phone, from Ford Motor Company, its affiliates, service providers, and its dealers about product information, offers and incentives, and I direct Ford to share my information with its dealers.  Please be aware dealers may market to you themselves and if you wish to unsubscribe from marketing from dealers, you will need to contact the dealership(s) directly to unsubscribe.

emailOptInPolicy.English:
Click here to receive communications, including emails, from Ford Motor Company of Canada, Limited and The Lincoln Motor Company* (together, Ford), and your authorized dealership about them and their products, services, events, news, updates, offers, promotions, customized ads and more. You may withdraw consent at any time. Ford is seeking consent on its own behalf and on behalf of your authorized dealership. For more information about and how to contact your authorized dealership, please CLICK HERE.  
 
To review our Privacy Policy, including your right to access or correct your personal information, opt-out (deletion from marketing lists), our service provider practices and storage of data in the U.S. please CLICK HERE. If you have any questions you may also contact a Customer Service Representative at 1-800-565-FORD (3673) or write us at The Canadian Road P.O. Box 2000, Oakville, Ontario, Canada L6K 0C8. 
 
* Ford Motor Company of Canada, Limited carries on business as The Lincoln Motor Company.
emailOptInPolicy.French:
Cochez cette static let pour recevoir des communications, y compris des courriels, de Ford du Canada Limitée et de La compagnie automobile Lincoln* (Ford ensemble), et de votre concessionnaire autorisé à leur sujet ou au sujet de leurs produits et services, ainsi que des événements, des nouvelles, des mises à jour, des offres, des promotions, des annonces personnalisées et plus encore. Vous pouvez retirer votre consentement à tout moment. Ford  requiert votre consentement en son propre nom et au nom de votre concessionnaire autorisé. Pour de plus amples renseignements au sujet de votre concessionnaire autorisé et sur la façon de communiquer avec lui, veuillez CLIQUER ICI.  
 
Pour consulter notre politique de confidentialité, y compris votre droit d'accéder à vos renseignements personnels ou de les modifier, le désabonnement (retrait des listes de marketing), les pratiques de nos prestataires de services et le stockage des données aux États-Unis, veuillez CLIQUER ICI. Si vous avez des questions, vous pouvez également communiquer avec un représentant du service à la clientèle au 1 800 565-FORD (3673) ou nous écrire à l'adresse suivante : The Canadian Road, C.P. 2000, Oakville (Ontario) L6K 0C8, Canada. 
 
*Ford du Canada Limitée fait affaire sous la raison sociale de La compagnie automobile Lincoln.

emailOptInPolicyFirst.English: Check here to receive communications, including emails, from Ford Motor Company of Canada, Limited and The Lincoln Motor Company* (together, Ford), and your authorized dealership about them and  their products, services, events, news, updates, offers, promotions, customized ads and more. You may withdraw consent at any time. Ford is seeking consent on its own behalf and on behalf of your authorized dealership. For more information about and how to contact your authorized dealership, please CLICK HERE.
emailOptInPolicyFirst.French: Cochez cette case pour recevoir des communications, y compris des courriels, de Ford du Canada Limitée et de La compagnie automobile Lincoln* (Ford ensemble), et de votre concessionnaire autorisé à leur sujet ou au sujet de leurs produits et services, ainsi que des événements, des nouvelles, des mises à jour, des offres, des promotions, des annonces personnalisées et plus encore. Vous pouvez retirer votre consentement à tout moment. Ford  requiert votre consentement en son propre nom et au nom de votre concessionnaire autorisé. Pour de plus amples renseignements au sujet de votre concessionnaire autorisé et sur la façon de communiquer avec lui, veuillez CLIQUER ICI.

emailOptInPolicySecond.English:
To review our Privacy Policy, including your right to access or correct your personal information, opt-out (deletion from marketing lists), our service provider practices and storage of data in the U.S. please CLICK HERE.  If you have any questions you may also contact a Customer Service Representative at 1-800-565-FORD (3673) or write us at The Canadian Road P.O. Box 2000, Oakville, Ontario, Canada L6K 0C8. 
 
* Ford Motor Company of Canada, Limited carries on business as The Lincoln Motor Company.
emailOptInPolicySecond.French:
Pour consulter notre politique de confidentialité, y compris votre droit d'accéder à vos renseignements personnels ou de les modifier, le désabonnement (retrait des listes de marketing), les pratiques de nos prestataires de services et le stockage des données aux États-Unis, veuillez CLIQUER ICI. Si vous avez des questions, vous pouvez également communiquer avec un représentant du service à la clientèle au 1 800 565-FORD (3673) ou nous écrire à l'adresse suivante : The Canadian Road, C.P. 2000, Oakville (Ontario)  L6K 0C8, Canada. 
 
*Ford du Canada Limitée fait affaire sous la raison sociale de La compagnie automobile Lincoln.

enterSameInfo.English: Please enter the SAME phone or email you provided before your test-drive.
enterSameInfo.Spanish: Introduzca el MISMO número de teléfono o la MISMA dirección de correo electrónico que nos proporcionó antes de la prueba de conducción.

enterSameInfoPro.English: Please enter the SAME email you registered with.

followUpSurvey.English: In order to help Ford improve future events, would you be interested in participating in a one-time follow-up survey?
followUpSurvey.Spanish: Con el fin de ayudar a Ford a mejorar sus futuros eventos, ¿le interesaría participar en una única encuesta de seguimiento?

household_income.English: What is your total Household Income?
household_income.French: Quel est votre revenue totale a la maison?

howFamiliar.English: How familiar are you with the following brands' current models?
howFamiliar.Spanish: ¿Cuál es su nivel de familiarización con los siguientes modelos?

howFamiliarLincoln.English: How familiar are you with Lincoln's current models?
howFamiliarLincoln.Spanish: ¿Cuál es su nivel de familiarización con los modelos actuales de Lincoln?

howFamiliarFord.English: How familiar are you with Ford's current models?
howFamiliarFord.Spanish: ¿Cuál es su nivel de familiarización con los modelos actuales de Ford?

howLikelyPurchase.English: For your next vehicle purchase, how likely would you be to consider purchasing the following brands?
howLikelyPurchase.Spanish: Para la compra de su próximo vehículo, ¿cuál sería la probabilidad de que considere comprar las siguientes marcas?

howLikelyPurchaseLincoln.English: For your next vehicle purchase, how likely would you be to consider purchasing a Lincoln vehicle?
howLikelyPurchaseLincoln.Spanish: ¿Cuál es la probabilidad de que se plantee adquirir un Lincoln la próxima vez que compre un vehículo?

howLikelyPurchaseLincolnPost.English: Based on your test-drive experience, how likely would you be to consider purchasing a vehicle from Lincoln?
howLikelyPurchaseLincolnPost.Spanish: Basándose en la prueba de conducción, ¿cuál es la probabilidad de que se plantee adquirir un vehículo Lincoln?

howLikelyPurchaseFord.English: For your next vehicle purchase, how likely would you be to consider purchasing a Ford vehicle?
howLikelyPurchaseFord.Spanish: ¿Cuál es la probabilidad de que se plantee adquirir un Ford la próxima vez que compre un vehículo?

howLikelyPurchaseFordPost.English: Based on your test-drive experience, how likely would you be to consider purchasing a vehicle from Ford?
howLikelyPurchaseFordPost.Spanish: Basándose en la prueba de conducción, ¿cuál es la probabilidad de que se plantee adquirir un vehículo Ford?

howLikelyRecommend.English: How likely are you to recommend Ford to a friend, relative or colleague?
howLikelyRecommend.Spanish: ¿Con qué probabilidad recomendaría Ford a un amigo, familiar o compañero?

howLikelyRecommendPost.English: Based on your experience today, how likely are you to recommend Lincoln to a friend, relative or colleague?
howLikelyRecommendPost.Spanish: Basándose en su experiencia de hoy, ¿con qué probabilidad recomendaría Lincoln a un amigo, familiar o compañero?

howLikelyRecommendPre.English: Prior to your experience today, how likely are you to recommend Lincoln to a friend, relative or colleague?
howLikelyRecommendPre.Spanish: Antes de su experiencia de hoy, ¿con qué probabilidad recomendaría Lincoln a un amigo, familiar o compañero?

howLikelyRecommendPostFord.English: Based on your experience today, how likely are you to recommend Ford to a friend, relative or colleague?
howLikelyRecommendPostFord.Spanish: Basándose en su experiencia de hoy, ¿con qué probabilidad recomendaría Ford a un amigo, familiar o compañero?

howLikelyRecommendPreFord.English: Prior to your experience today, how likely are you to recommend Ford to a friend, relative or colleague?
howLikelyRecommendPreFord.Spanish: Antes de su experiencia de hoy, ¿con qué probabilidad recomendaría Ford a un amigo, familiar o compañero?

howPurchase.English: How do you plan to acquire your next vehicle?
howPurchase.Spanish: ¿Cómo piensas adquirir tu próximo vehículo? ¿Compra o Arrendamiento?

impactedOverallOpinion.English: How has this event impacted your overall opinion of Ford?

impactedOverallOpinionRanger.English: How has this event impacted your overall opinion of Ranger?

impression.English: What is your overall opinion or impression of the following brands?
impression.Spanish: ¿Cuál es su opinión general o impresión sobre las siguientes marcas?

impressionPost.English: Now that you've taken a test-drive, what is your overall opinion or impression of:
impressionPost.Spanish: Ahora que ha hecho la prueba de conducción, ¿cuál es su opinión general o impresión sobre?

impressionPostLincoln.English: Now that you've taken a test-drive, what is your overall opinion or impression of Lincoln?
impressionPostLincoln.Spanish: Ahora que ha hecho la prueba de conducción, ¿cuál es su opinión general o impresión de Lincoln?

impressionPostFord.English: Now that you've taken a test-drive, what is your overall opinion or impression of Ford?
impressionPostFord.Spanish: Ahora que ha hecho la prueba de conducción, ¿cuál es su opinión general o impresión de Ford?

impressionPre.English: Before taking a test drive, what is your overall opinion or impression of:
impressionPre.Spanish: Antes de la prueba de conducción, ¿cuál era su opinión general o impresión sobre?

impressionPreLincoln.English: Before taking a test-drive, what is your overall opinion of Lincoln?
impressionPreLincoln.Spanish: Antes de la prueba de conducción, ¿cuál era su opinión general de Lincoln?

impressionPreFord.English: Before taking a test-drive, what is your overall opinion of Ford?
impressionPreFord.Spanish: Antes de la prueba de conducción, ¿cuál era su opinión general de Ford?

lastNameLength.English: Last Name must be at least 2 characters
lastNameLength.French: Nom de famille doivent être au moins 2 caractères
lastNameLength.Spanish: Apellido debe tener al menos 2 caracteres

invalidAddressConfirm.English: If you are getting this message in error please press confirm.
invalidAddressConfirm.Spanish: Si recibe este mensaje por error, presione confirmar.

invalidEmailAddressConfirm.English: If you are getting this message in error please press confirm.
invalidEmailAddressConfirm.Spanish: Si recibe este mensaje por error, presione confirmar.

invalidPhoneNumber.French: S'il vous plaît entrez un numéro de téléphone valide.

lincolnPostSurvey.Spanish: Lincoln Encuesta Después de la Prueba de Manejo

fordPostSurvey.Spanish: Ford Encuesta Después de la Prueba de Manejo

mostLikelyBuy.English: If you were to purchase or lease a new vehicle today, what would you most likely buy?
mostLikelyBuy.Spanish: Si se decidiera a hacer un leasing o compra hoy, ¿cuál sería el vehículo?

neitherAgreeNorDisagree.Spanish: Ni de acuerdo ni en desacuerdo

nextPurchaseFord.English: The next time you are shopping for an automotive vehicle, how likely are you to consider a Ford?

enterValidOrFindName.English: Please enter a valid phone number or email, or find your name in Advanced Search.
enterValidOrFindName.Spanish: Por favor, introduzca un número de teléfono válido o correo electrónico, o encontrar su nombre en Búsqueda avanzada.

onlyOne.English: Only ONE submission per person please.

optInPlaceholder.English: Please email me communications including product information, offers, and incentives from Ford Motor Company and the local dealer.
optInPlaceholder.French: S'il vous plaît écrivez-moi des communications, y compris les informations sur les produits, offres et incitations de Ford et les concessionnaires locaux. Est-il acceptable d'utiliser votre adresse e-mail pour vous contacter?
optInPlaceholder.Spanish: Quiero recibir comunicaciones, incluidas información sobre productos y servicios, encuestas, y ofertas especiales de Ford Motor Company y sus concesionarios.

overallExperience.English: Please rate your overall experience at this event.

phoneDisclaimer.English: Standard message and data rates may apply.
phoneDisclaimer.Spanish: Pueden aplicar las tarifas normales para mensajes de texto y datos.

pleaseAdjustEmail.English: Please adjust. If you are getting this message in error please ignore.
pleaseAdjustEmail.French: S'il vous plait, entrez une adresse courriel valide.

pleaseHaveRepConfirm.English: Please have Lincoln Representative confirm Registration.
pleaseHaveRepConfirm.Spanish: Por favor, tenga Lincoln Representante confirmar el registro.

pleaseProvideSignature.Spanish: Por favor proporciona una firma válida

pleaseReadAndSign.English: Please read and sign the waiver below.
pleaseReadAndSign.Spanish: Lea y firme el siguiente pliego de descargo.

pleaseReadAndSignMinor.English: Please read and sign the waiver below if you've entered minor names.
pleaseReadAndSignMinor.Spanish: Lea y firme el siguiente pliego de descargo si ha ingresado nombres menores.

pleaseSelectDriven.English: Please select the Lincoln vehicles that you test-drove today. You can select up to 3 vehicles.
pleaseSelectDriven.Spanish: Por favor seleccione los vehículos Lincoln que ha probado hoy. Puede seleccionar hasta 3 vehículos.

pleaseSelectDrivenFord.English: Please select the Ford vehicles that you test-drove today.
pleaseSelectDrivenFord.Spanish: Por favor seleccione los vehículos Ford que ha probado hoy.

pleaseSelectDrivenOrder.English: Please select the vehicles in the order you drove them.
pleaseSelectDrivenOrder.Spanish: Por favor seleccione los vehículos en el orden en que los condujo.

PREFER NOT TO SAY.French: JE PRÉFÈRE NE PAS LE DIRE

purchaseOrLease.English: How do you plan to acquire your next vehicle?
purchaseOrLease.French: Comment prévoyez-vous d'acquérir votre prochain véhicule?

readAndAgreedWaiver.English: By signing you indicate that you have read and agree to the waiver provided here.
readAndAgreedWaiver.Spanish: Al firmar, indica que ha leído y acepta el pliego de descargo anterior.

areYouSureRestart.English: Are you sure you want to restart the survey?
areYouSureRestart.French: Êtes-vous certain de vouloir redémarrer le sondage?

restartWarning.English: Restarting the survey will erase the current survey data permanently.
restartWarning.French: Le redémarrage du sondage effacera en permanence les données actuelle.
restartWarning.Spanish: Al reiniciar la encuesta se borrarán los datos de la encuesta actual de forma permanente.

shortPrivacyCopy.English: Ford Motor Company respects your privacy and treats your personal information with care.
shortPrivacyCopy.Spanish: Ford Motor Company respeta su confidencialidad y trata su información personal con respeto.

reviewInfo.French: Veuillez s'il vous plaît confirmer vos coordonnées.

searchNameEmailPhone.English: Search by Name, Email or Phone

selectThree.English: Please select your top three vehicles of interest between the two brands

fordOverallOpinion.English: What is your overall opinion of Ford Motor Company?

textOptInPlaceholder.English: Please send me vehicle information via text message.
textOptInPlaceholder.Spanish: Por favor envíenme información de los vehículos por mensaje de texto.

thankYouParticipateIn.English: Thank you for completing the survey and for participating in
thankYouParticipateIn.Spanish: ¡Gracias por completar la encuesta y participando en

thankYouPostDrive.English: Thank you for completing the post test-drive survey and for participating with Lincoln.
thankYouPostDrive.Spanish: Gracias por completar la encuesta posterior a la prueba y participando con Lincoln.

thankYouPostDriveFord.English: Thank you for completing the post test-drive survey and for participating with Ford.
thankYouPostDriveFord.Spanish: Gracias por completar la encuesta posterior a la prueba y participando con Ford.

thankYouPreDrive.English: Thank you for completing the pre-drive registration. Please remember to complete the post-drive survey after taking your test-drive!
thankYouPreDrive.Spanish: Gracias por completar el registro previo a la prueba. ¡Recuerde completar la encuesta posterior a la prueba cuando termine!

thankYouRegister.English: Thank you for registering with the Lincoln Motor Company.
thankYouRegister.Spanish: Gracias por registrarse con Lincoln Motor Company.

thankYouRegisterFord.English: Thank you for registering with Ford Motor Company.
thankYouRegisterFord.Spanish: Gracias por registrarse con Ford Motor Company.

threeModels.English: You may select up to three models.
threeModels.French: Vous pouvez sélectionner jusqu'à trois modèles.

under18.English: Do you have anyone under the age of 18 riding with you today?
under18.Spanish: ¿Tiene a alguien menor de 18 años conduciendo con usted hoy?

voiQuestion.English: I am interested in learning more about the following Ford vehicles.
voiQuestion.French: Je suis intéressé à recevoir plus d'informations sur les véhicules suivants
voiQuestion.Spanish: Me interesaría recibir más información sobre los siguientes vehículos.

whenPurchase.English: When do you plan to acquire your next vehicle?
whenPurchase.French: Quand prévoyez-vous d'acheter votre prochain véhicule?

definiteNotConsider.Spanish: No me lo plantearé en absoluto

maybeConsider.English: Maybe Will / Maybe Will NOT Consider
maybeConsider.Spanish: Quizá me lo plantee, quizá no

maybeRecommend.English: Maybe Will / Maybe Will Not Recommend

scanBarcode.English: Scan the code on your Ford Wristband
scanBarcode.Spanish: Escanee el código en su pulsera Ford

participateWarning.English: WARNING: You will not be able to participate.

ifNotAcceptTerms.English: If you do not accept these terms, your survey will not be saved and you will not be allowed to participate in a test-drive.
ifNotAcceptTerms.Spanish: Si no acepta estos términos, su encuesta no se guardará y no podrá participar en una prueba de manejo.

waiverTitle.Spanish: Pliego de descargo de prueba de conducción de Ford

minors.Spanish: Escriba el nombre del menor aqui, por favor:

waiverPart1.English: I, undersigned, in consideration of riding in one or more automobiles at the above-named program, do hereby release, discharge, indemnify and hold harmless Ford Motor Company, the Lincoln Dealership supplying the vehicle(s), GTB Agency, LLC, and any of their subsidiaries, officers, agents and employees (collectively, the releases), from all claims, demands, actions or liabilities of whatever kind and nature, including but not limited to bodily injury, death or property damage arising from, or in any way connected to, the undersigned’s use, operation, inspection or testing of said automobile or automobiles, whether negligent or otherwise. This also includes all costs, losses or expenses in connection therewith arising from, or by reason of, any property damage arising out of any accident or occurrence during or in connection with said use, whether negligent or otherwise.
waiverPart1.Spanish: Yo, el abajo firmante, con el fin de hacer una prueba de conducción de uno o más de los automóviles del programa nombrado anteriormente, renuncio, libero, escuso y descargo de toda responsabilidad a Ford Motor Company, el concesionario de Lincoln que suministra los vehículos, GTB Agency, LLC y cualquiera de sus subsidiarias, agentes, representantes o empleados (colectivamente, las partes liberadas) de toda reclamación, exigencia, acción o responsabilidad de cualquier clase y naturaleza, incluidos, sin limitación, daños físicos, fallecimientos o daños a la propiedad que se deriven o relacionen con el uso, operación, inspección o prueba por parte del abajo firmante de dicho automóvil o automóviles, ya sea por negligencia o de otro modo. Esto incluye también todos los costes, pérdidas o gastos derivados o causados por los daños a la propiedad provocados por cualquier accidente o incidente que se produzca durante este uso o en relación con él, ya sea por negligencia o de otro modo.

waiverPart1_navigator.English: I, undersigned, in consideration of riding in one or more automobiles at the aforementioned program, do hereby release, discharge, indemnify and hold harmless Ford Motor Company, the Ford Dealership supplying the vehicle(s), GTB Agency, LLC, as agent for Ford Motor Company, and any of their subsidiaries, officers, agents and employees (collectively, the releasees) from all claims, demands, actions or liabilities of whatever kind and nature, including but not limited to bodily injury, death or property damage arising from, or in any way connected to, the undersigned’s use, operation, inspection or testing of said automobile or automobiles, whether negligent or otherwise. This also includes all costs, losses or expenses in connection therewith arising from, or by reason of, any property damage arising out of any accident or occurrence during or in connection with said use, whether negligent or otherwise.
waiverPart1_navigator.Spanish: Yo, el abajo firmante, con el fin de hacer una prueba de conducción de uno o más de los automóviles del programa nombrado anteriormente, renuncio, libero, escuso y descargo de toda responsabilidad a Ford Motor Company, el concesionario de Lincoln que suministra los vehículos, Xperience Communications, GTB Agency, LLC y cualquiera de sus subsidiarias, agentes, representantes o empleados (colectivamente, las partes liberadas) de toda reclamación, exigencia, acción o responsabilidad de cualquier clase y naturaleza, incluidos, sin limitación, daños físicos, fallecimientos o daños a la propiedad que se deriven o relacionen con el uso, operación, inspección o prueba por parte del abajo firmante de dicho automóvil o automóviles, ya sea por negligencia o de otro modo. Esto incluye también todos los costes, pérdidas o gastos derivados o causados por los daños a la propiedad provocados por cualquier accidente o incidente que se produzca durante este uso o en relación con él, ya sea por negligencia o de otro modo.

waiverPart1_transit.English: I, undersigned, in consideration of riding in one or more automobiles at the aforementioned program, do hereby release, discharge, indemnify and hold harmless Ford Motor Company, the Ford Dealership supplying the vehicle(s), GTB Agency, LLC, as agent for Ford Motor Company, and any of their subsidiaries, officers, agents and employees (collectively, the releasees) from all claims, demands, actions or liabilities of whatever kind and nature, including but not limited to bodily injury, death or property damage arising from, or in any way connected to, the undersigned’s use, operation, inspection or testing of said automobile or automobiles, whether negligent or otherwise. This also includes all costs, losses or expenses in connection therewith arising from, or by reason of, any property damage arising out of any accident or occurrence during or in connection with said use, whether negligent or otherwise.

waiverPart2.English: In furtherance of the intent that this release be full and final, I expressly waive the benefit of Section 1542 of the California Civil Code which states that “A general release does not extend to claims which the creditor does not know or suspect to exist in his favor at the time of executing the release and which, if known to him, must have materially affected his settlement with the debtor.”
waiverPart2.Spanish: En consonancia con la intención de que este descargo sea definitivo, renuncio expresamente a los beneficios de la sección 1542 del código civil de California, que establece que ”un descargo general no se aplica a reclamaciones a su favor sobre las que no tuviera conocimiento ni sospechase de su existencia el acreedor en el momento de ejecutar el descargo y que, si las hubiera conocido, podrían haber afectado sustancialmente a su acuerdo con el deudor”.

waiverPart2_transit.English: FOR CALIFORNIA RESIDENTS ONLY: In furtherance of the intent that this release be full and final, I expressly waive the benefit of Section 1542 of the California Civil Code, which states that “A general release does not extend to claims which the creditor does not know or suspect to exist in his favor at the time of executing the release and which, if known to him, must have materially affected his settlement with the debtor.”

waiverPart3.English: I acknowledge that I have read and fully understand all of the foregoing, and that no officer, agent or employee of Ford Motor Company or GTB Agency, LLC, as agent for Ford Motor Company is authorized to vary the terms or provisions of this instrument, or make any representation contrary to the provisions hereof.
waiverPart3.Spanish: Confirmo que he leído y comprendo todo lo anterior y que ningún representante, agente o empleado de Ford Motor Company o GTB Agency, LLC está autorizado para alterar las condiciones o disposiciones de este instrumento ni realizar ningún tipo de declaración contraria a las disposiciones del presente.

waiverPart3_navigator.English: I acknowledge that I have read and fully understand all of the foregoing, and that no officer, agent or employee of Ford Motor Company, Xperience Communications, or GTB Agency, LLC, is authorized to vary the terms or provisions of this instrument, or make any representation contrary to the provisions hereof.
waiverPart3_navigator.Spanish: Confirmo que he leído y comprendo todo lo anterior y que ningún representante, agente o empleado de Ford Motor Company, Xperience Communications o GTB Agency, LLC está autorizado para alterar las condiciones o disposiciones de este instrumento ni realizar ningún tipo de declaración contraria a las disposiciones del presente.

waiverPart3_transit.English: I acknowledge that I have read and fully understand all of the foregoing, and that no officer, agent or employee of Ford Motor Company or GTB Agency, LLC, as agent for Ford Motor Company is authorized to vary the terms or provisions of this instrument, or make any representation contrary to the provisions hereof.

waiverPart4.English: I assume complete responsibility for all risks and for injuries, death and/or property damage that may occur as a result of those risks, even if such injuries, death or property damage occurs in a manner that is not foreseeable at the time I sign this release. I make these representations with the full understanding that you, the releasees, are relying on these representations.
waiverPart4.Spanish: Asumo plena responsabilidad por cualquier riesgo, lesión, muerte o daño a la propiedad que pueda producirse como resultado de tales riesgos, incluso si dichas lesiones, muerte o daños a la propiedad son imprevisibles en el momento en que firmo esta exención. Hago estas representaciones con el pleno conocimiento de que ustedes, los eximidos, dependen de ellas.

waiverPart5.English: I certify that I have a valid driver’s license and am authorized to drive in the state in which the Event is being conducted; I have valid automobile insurance throughout the testing period; I and all passengers in my vehicle will use available safety belts while the vehicle is being operated; I am not aware of any medical condition or other circumstance that may affect my ability to participate in the Event; and I have not consumed alcoholic beverages or illegal substances prior to participating in the Event.
waiverPart5.Spanish: Certifico que tengo un permiso de conducir en vigor y estoy autorizado/a para conducir en el estado en que se está llevando a cabo el Evento; tengo un seguro de automóvil en vigor durante todo el período de la prueba; yo y todos los pasajeros de mi vehículo utilizaran los cinturones de seguridad disponibles mientras el vehículo esté en marcha; no tengo conocimiento de ninguna afección médica ni cualquier otra circunstancia que pueda afectar mi capacidad para participar en el Evento; y no he consumido bebidas alcohólicas ni sustancias ilegales antes de participar en el Evento.

waiverPart6.English: The terms and provisions of this instrument shall be binding upon the heirs, executors or administrators of the undersigned. I certify that I have read the foregoing and am responsible for my actions.
waiverPart6.Spanish: Los términos y disposiciones del presente instrumento serán vinculantes para los herederos, albaceas o administradores de los abajo firmantes. Certifico que he leído lo antecede y soy responsable de mis acciones.

waiverPart6_transit.English: The terms and provisions of this waiver shall be binding upon the heirs, executors or administrators of the undersigned. I certify that I have read the foregoing and am responsible for my actions.

waiverPart7.English: I certify that I am 18 years of age or older, with a valid driver’s license.
waiverPart7.Spanish: Certifico que soy mayor de edad y tengo un permiso de conducir en vigor.

waiverPart8.English: Note: The Event staff reserves the right to refuse any participants demonstrating unruly or inappropriate behavior that may result in injury to themselves or others. The possession or use of any alcoholic beverages will result in the automatic disqualification of the participant from the drive. Such determinations of refusal/disqualification shall be at the sole discretion of the drive and Event staff, whose decisions shall be final in all respects. Event participant grants permission to utilize participant's image, likeness, actions and statements in any live or recorded audio or photographic display, or other transmission, exhibition, publication or reproduction made of or at the Event (regardless of whether before, during or after the Event) in any medium or context without further authorization or compensation.
waiverPart8.Spanish: Nota: El personal del Evento se reserva el derecho a rechazar a cualquier participante que demuestre un comportamiento insurrecto o inapropiado que pueda resultar en lesiones a sí mismo o a otros. La posesión o consumo de cualquier bebida alcohólica resultará en la descalificación automática del participante de la prueba. Tales determinaciones de rechazo/descalificación serán a la entera discreción del personal de la prueba y el Evento, cuyas decisiones serán definitivas en todos los aspectos. El participante en el Evento concede permiso para utilizar su imagen, apariencia, acciones y declaraciones en cualquier audio o grabación en directo o en diferido, u otro tipo de transmisión, exhibición, publicación o reproducción creados antes, durante o después del Evento en cualquier medio o contexto sin autorización o compensación adicionales.

waiverPart8_transit.English: I acknowledge that this waiver will be considered fraudulent if I do not complete a test-drive, thereby forfeiting my donation and potential participation in future events.

handStampQuestion.English: Did you already have your hand stamped by Ford inside?

autoshowQuestion.English: Did you already register with Ford inside?

raptorRules.English: Click here for official rules and details
